properties.title: Ritom funicular
properties.abstract: The Ritom funicular is a special attraction thanks to its maximum gradient of 87,8%, which makes it one of the steepest funiculars of the world. A travel on the Ritom funicular is an unforgettable experience and leads you to the starting point of several enchanting excursions.
properties.description: The funicular - one of the steepest aerial cable cars - takes visitors to the spectacular Piora Valley, one of the most untouched areas of Ticino. It is an ideal starting point for many hiking and biking excursions, it offers great opportunities to admire the rich vegetation and the large variety of alpine flowers, lush green meadows where cows and horses graze peacefully, and to see the open sky reflected in the clear waters of several alpine lakes.
properties.name: Bellinzonese e Alto Ticino Turismo
